poison.name: Paratoxin
poison.description: The target takes [Damage Rate: 90%] fixed damage (if a player) or [Damage Rate: 180%] fixed damage (if a mob) every second for 9s (does not trigger on-damage effects or receive skill/damage boosts), followed by Reduces Movement Speed by 40%, Slow effect diminishes over 6s

poison.name: Enhanced Paratoxin
poison.description: The target takes [Damage Rate: 120%] fixed damage (if a player) or [Damage Rate: 240%] fixed damage (if a mob) every second for 9s (does not trigger on-damage effects or receive skill/damage boosts), followed by Reduces Movement Speed by 60%, Slow effect diminishes over 6s

poison.name: Advanced Paratoxin
poison.description: The target takes [Damage Rate: 180%] fixed damage (if a player) or [Damage Rate: 360%] fixed damage (if a mob) every second for 9s (does not trigger on-damage effects or receive skill/damage boosts), followed by Reduces Movement Speed by 80%, Slow effect diminishes over 6s
